description: Convert any link into a QR code and get a shareable image link in seconds. Create codes for websites, apps, forms, and more with minimal effort. Streamline sharing across print, packaging, signage, and events.

tools.name: url_to_qrcode
tools.description: Convert a URL into a QR code image and return the download link. The QR code will be saved as a PNG file and accessible via HTTP.

url.description: The URL to convert into a QR code (e.g., https://example.com)

width.description: Width of the QR code image in pixels. Default: 300

errorCorrectionLevel.description: QR code error correction level. L=Low(7%), M=Medium(15%), Q=Quartile(25%), H=High(30%). Default: M
